    • Method Detail

      • matchTempleteEuclid

        public static Image matchTempleteEuclid(Image image,
                                        Image template)
        Match template using Euclidean distance between template and sub-image.

        Attention! Extremely slow method! Use small images (resize big images) or another methods!

        Parameters:
        image - Source image where we try to find template.
        template - Image with object that we want to find.
        Returns:
        Result image where we will be save result. Should have same size and 1 channel! This image contains average Euclidean distance in normalize form (all values between Color.MIN_VALUE and Color.MAX_VALUE) between template and all sub-images.

      • matchTempleteHist

        public static Image matchTempleteHist(Image image,
                                      Image template,
                                      int compareType)
        Match template using image histogram between template and sub-image.

        Attention! Extremely slow method! Use small images (resize big images) or another methods!

        Parameters:
        image - Source image where we try to find template.
        template - Image with object that we want to find.
        compareType - Type of compare histograms. Use Hist.HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_*.
        Returns:
        Result image where we will be save result. Should have same size and 1 channel! This image contains distance in normalize form (all values between Color.MIN_VALUE and Color.MAX_VALUE) between template and all sub-images.
